title: The Day I Found Her - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Psychological   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Aristocracy   Arranged Marriage   Handsome Male Lead   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Politics   R-15
author: Shinonome Kai   東雲カイ
description:
I destroyed the heart of my wife, who loved me dearly.
This is a story of how I broke her, the story of that regret, and the afterward of said regret.

***The continuation of 'The Day I Disappeared', told from Gilbert's pov>
